contentText.text: David’s side business grows, but he becomes concerned about using Johnson Controls materials and equipment – someone is certain to notice eventually.
So, he creates a company and asks a colleague of his, Ingrid, who works in Sales to arrange to sell equipment to him in exchange for a portion of the profit he makes.

revelCollOut.text: Ingrid, I’ve figured it out. Just create purchase orders that make it look like you’re selling the equipment to one of our distributors. You’ll get additional sales and I’ll get a good discount.
